text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The Saudi Arabia R.C.â€”a 1,600-meter<n>race open
only to junior year<n>Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I can't imagine us faltering here. Besides,<n>my
sights are set far higher: the Satsuki<n>Sho, the first
race of the Classic Triple<n>Crown.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Accordingly, I will pace myself for a<n>2,000-meter
race instead. I trust that<n>you do not object.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Only Symboli Rudolf could be this<n>confident
going into a graded race...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Come in.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text: Hi, President. I... Um...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, there you are.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for calling you over here. I<n>heard that
you came to show your<n>support.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text: Y-yes... That's right, I...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to introduce you, Trainer. This<n>is the
student council's general manager.<n>I believe I've
mentioned her before.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Quite the opposite, actually. She only<n>joined the
student council recently.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, I inspired her so much that<n>she
wanted to join me in making a<n>difference at the
academy.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, I do remember<n>Symboli
Rudolf mentioning her... but she<n>seems a little less
enthusiastic than I'd<n>imagined.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
Um... President? I wanted to apologize...<n>You
know, for the other day...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Was that weighing on your mind? I<n>assure you,
you have nothing to<n>apologize for.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
But you trusted me to handle that<n>assignment...
and in the end, you had to<n>look over my shoulder
the whole time.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It sounds like she needed Symboli<n>Rudolf to help
her with some student<n>council business.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hardly. I gave you a little advice, that's<n>all. You
did the lion's share yourself.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text:
If you say so, but I shouldn't be adding<n>to your
workload just before a race...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Your thoughtfulness is commendable,<n>but I assure
you, you need not worry.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Watch me race, and you'll see that I<n>have suffered
no ill effects.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
1,600 meters isn't so far. I trust you'll<n>watch me
to the end.

text_block_list.name: Student Council General Manager
text_block_list.text: O-of course!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, then. Trainer, shall we be off?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I hope you'll also keep a keen eye on my<n>
performance today, so that we may<n>prepare for
what lies ahead.
